name: Lights out (itch) (dogiordano, Searon, Teshia, ZESTisBEST, Billythekidzz)
name_original: Lights out (itch) (dogiordano, Searon, Teshia, ZESTisBEST, Billythekidzz)
description:
Build torches and turrets to defend the village totem from invisible enemies.
Every time you place a building, you'll have 3 more random ones to choose from.

Monsters are visible only when lit by a torch.
Turrets can only shoot revealed monsters.

Tip: In building mode, time is slowed and you can right-click to exit it.

How long can you survive?


Programming: dogiordano, Charlie
Art: Teshia, Searon
VFX: Billythekidzz
Audio: CDWpod
